attributes.review: OMG THIS APP IS THE WORST!??? ITS ALL FAKE AND ITS ASKED FOR  Private information that they don’t need to know about and this APP IS horrible  GENZ WILL WIN #blacklifesmatter #georgefloyd #GENZ WE WILL RISE p.s please delete this app
attributes.title: BAD APP SO BAD

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and when I opened it I saw a orange peel guy telling me to vote for him and I was so scared for my life, anyways my phone kept crashing really bad to where the point I had to break my phone, 😌so now I have a new phone but yeah don’t get the app🙂
attributes.title: Angela

attributes.review: Dear fellow Trump kinnies😭😭 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP💔💔 Completely destroyed my life😔😔 Not long after downloading, I found that every single ounce of respect that others held for me had completely disappeared😨 Not only that, but people called me privileged and it hurt my conservative, white, cis, male feelings😭💔 Those darn Zoomers😔!! They ruin everything! I was enjoying myself, happy knowing that I was more 5 times less likely to be incarcerated than someone with more melanin and I would always be treated much better by those around me because of my skin tone. Now, beautiful POC who have been oppressed for much longer than America has been a country are trying to get justice and it’s making me angy😠 How dare people think that they can make me less privileged by putting us on a level playing field?? It’s so not faaaiirrr😭😭 Now no one who has any sense of empathy, justice, etc respects me😤😭💔
attributes.title: ZERO STARS😡😡

attributes.review: the second I downloaded the app my phone started to glitch and a Cheeto puff started to appear on my screen now my phone is ruined... DELETE THE APP !!😡
attributes.title: A CHEETO KEEPS APPEARING 😡

attributes.review: I went on the app , and it is racist , and very rude towards dogs and mitochondrion of plasterfill
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: so... i downloaded this app thinking it would give me info and tell me positive things that our president did for us. well turns out that president trumpet 🎺 here is a racist, homophobic, arrogant, OOMPA LOOMPA 🍊 i didn’t appreciate that he didn’t refer to the pandemic book that bush set in stone and obama had. this idiot refuses to look at it since “he knows what he’s doing” and “that book is made up” 🦄 i am appalled by this mans behavior and this app was 0 help giving me important information. what really blows my mind is that i caught CORONA while on this app🧦 i cant even smell my dirty socks and my feet are disgusting. i’m upset. i was doing everything in my power to not catch covid. but this loser somehow transferred it to me through this app🤡 if you don’t want to end up like me, DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP!! this app is trash and very unhelpful. this deserves 0 STARS✨🧚🏼💓
attributes.title: the orange oompa loompa gave me rona... what a piece of trash.

attributes.review: it happened when it was a usual Sunday while i was eating my nutritious healthy, usual breakfast. while i was ✨𝓼𝓬𝓻𝓸𝓵𝓲𝓷𝓰 𝓽𝓱𝓻𝓸𝓾𝓰𝓱 𝓲𝓰✨ i found out that our dear president Donald Trumpet had an app. so naturally, i went to download it and check out what our president, who is 𝓿𝓮𝓻𝔂 𝓿𝓮𝓻𝔂 dear to me, was up to. after it was done downloading, my body suddenly started ✨𝓵𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓽𝓪𝓽𝓲𝓷𝓰✨ off the ground. at first, i thought it was great! that trump’s app gave me cool superpowers. but how i was wrong. my perfect, shiny, long black hair turned into a yellow nothing, and my perfect golden skin turned into Oompa Loompa looking, wrinkly skin. but nothing could have prepared me to see such a horrific thing happen next. my chiseled abs that i’ve been working out to obtain for decades, turned into a big, fat beer belly. my limbs started to get big and flappy, and in a second, my perfect, model-like, toned body turned into an obese, old man’s body. when i realized that i turned into trump, i realized my mistake. downloading this app made me turn into the ugliest thing in the world, our president! i couldn’t believe that i supported him. how insensitive can someone be to force every one of his supporters to look like him? anyways, i deleted the app, but i still look like him. don’t download it and make the same mistake i did.
attributes.title: it turned me into him

attributes.review: Literally so dumb and no point of using this app very disappointed mr. trumpet 😾
attributes.title: Bruh
